articles.title: Hockey-EM: Bronze für die Frauen, Blech für die Männer! | Sport
articles.description: Bei der Hockey-EM in Gladbach gab statt zweimal Gold nur einmal Bronze
articles.content: Nach der tollen Vorrunde bei der Hockey-EM in Gladbach war noch der Traum von zwei Europameistertiteln möglich. Doch am Ende blieb nur für die deutschen Frauen ein dickes Trostpflaster übrig die Welt… [+2535 chars]

articles.title: Anchor Brewing Company to shutter after 127 years
articles.description: Many consider Anchor a San Francisco landmark in its own right due to its influence, which dates back to the Gold Rush.
articles.content:
The historic Anchor Brewing Company, often called the godfather of steam beer, is shutting down operations after 127 years.

articles.title: WA's great – and less-than-great – gold plots unearthed as price hits record high
articles.description: As long as gold has been mined people have tried to steal it. As the precious metal hits a record price, let's take a look back at some of the mad, bad and downright dumb ways crooks have tried to pocket the "miner's privilege".

As long as there has been gold mining in Western Australia people have been trying to steal it.
